roleset.name: become diverse, (cause to) become more diverse

example.name: with destination
example.text: Some of Sansui 's fellow audio - specialty companies , such as Aiwa Co. and Pioneer Electric Corp. ... or by diversifying into other consumer - electronics fields , including laser disks or portable cassette players .

propbank.arg: Some of Sansui 's fellow audio - specialty companies , such as Aiwa Co. and Pioneer Electric Corp.
into other consumer - electronics fields , including laser disks or portable cassette players

example.name: with start point
example.text: It has n't diversified beyond steel , nor has it linked up with a joint venture partner to share costs and risks .

example.name: with causal agent
example.text: GM 's interest in Jaguar reflects a desire to help diversify the U.S. company 's products in the growing luxury - car segment of the market .

propbank.arg: the U.S. company 's products in the growing luxury - car segment of the market

example.name: args 1-3
example.text: Another fundamental goal of our reform agenda is the diversification of our economy away from the oil sector into agriculture .

example.name: With arg0
example.text: Further , banks should embrace technology that will enhance their diversification of income generation activities .

example.name: Possessor as Arg1
example.text: Will the company 's diversification across different segments help to de - risk your business portfolio ?

roleset.note: DIVERSIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'diversify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no framenet entry. (from diversify.01-v predicate notes)
DIVERSIFICATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT DF-07. Framed by Claire. (from diversification.01-n)
